c:facetType.name: CategoricalChartTrendFacet
c:facetType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the categorical trend facet.

c:property.name: trend
c:property.c:documentation:
The trend plot is activated when the other chart plots indicate that their data should be trended.
To activate trending for a plot specify its trend type option.

c:complexType.name: TrendPointPlot
c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the point plot used for trends of categorical charts.

c:property.name: trend
c:property.c:documentation: Trends are not supported by this plot type.

c:property.name: nullInterpolationMode
c:property.c:documentation: The null interpolation mode is not supported by this plot type.

c:property.name: linesVisible
c:property.c:documentation: Indicates if the visual elements are connected with lines.

c:property.name: colorAxis
c:property.c:documentation: The index of the color axis to use for the plot.
